name: Mushroom Odyssey
description:
Mushroom odyssey

Your health depends on time, Time goes by health goes down.

The only way that you can survive is by finding fruits, and selling them to “Timeman”. Open your mind and try find interesting paths. 

Goal: you need continue the journey but for entering into the main gate “Timeman” wants from you 880 health points. 

Control:Walking - WASD ButtonsJump - Space barDouble Jump - 2x Space barBreaking - Q Interacting - EPause - EscThis game made in 20 hours for JamSo Updates for bugs will comes soon...
